decrypt

public static void decrypt(AESKey aesKey,
                           AESForFileListener listener,
                           java.io.File patchFile,
                           java.io.File decryptTo)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Decrypt the patchFile and save to decryptTo.

Parameters:
aesKey - the cipher key to use
listener - the progress listener, accept null
patchFile - the file to decrypt
decryptTo - the file to save the decrypted file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occurred when decrypting
